page.title: 16ST.MARY'S COMMUNICATION
page.content: {COMMUNICATIONS In the Isles of Scilly there are five main types of communications,there are the helicopter,telephone,post and a ship called the Scillonian.The Scillonian has a buffet,and a bar,there are four passenger decks,all together they can take six hundred passengers.It has three main holds for cargo and a mail room for parcels.It can also take cars or boats or anything on deck.It has a crane for unloading cargo,the crane can take up to six tonnes.The Scillonians weight is twelve thousand and fifty five point twenty five tonnes.The Scillonian has two twin mirrlees blackstone twelve thousand and twenty BHPengines at one thousand rpm to give it a service speed of fifteen point five knots.To replace her,it would cost between 7 and 8 million pounds.
